title: Can't change email address/password
body:
Whenever I try to change my unverified email address (because I lost my original email address) it says that i have to type in the password and my new email address but when I press change it says that the password is incorrect which is false since I can login into the LoL client and website... I can provide screenshots in pm if needed, please help!!! And now I get the message whenever I log in that says that i have to change my password but I have the same bug as with my email!!! but I'm logged into my account in the forum riot!

(ps: I can't even send a ticket to the league support since my email is unverified!!!)

replies.body:
So to confirm: If you log out of the account you're trying to verify the e-mail on, are you able to log back in? You said that you can log in to the client and website, but then later said that you're getting similar problems when attempting to log in as well.

I'd double check the server when logging in/verifying your e-mail.  Usually when I see issues like this it's because the changes are being attempted on the wrong server.  If it all checks out or if you can't log in at all, go ahead and [send us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll help recover your account :D
